ekit_testimonial_data.review: I had an amazing experience with Travice. They transformed my car from looking dull and worn-out to a show-stopper. The attention to detail was impeccable, and the exterior detailing made my car shine like it was brand new. Not only that, but their expertise in diagnosing and repairing a persistent engine issue saved me from costly repairs down the line. I highly recommend their services for anyone looking for top-notch car detailing and repair

I can't thank Travice enough for the outstanding service they provided. The interior detailing completely revitalized my car's cabin. It looked and smelled fantastic. They also went above and beyond by fixing an electrical problem that had been bothering me for months. Their knowledgeable team quickly diagnosed and resolved the issue, and now my car runs smoothly. I'm incredibly satisfied with their professionalism and attention to detail. You won't be disappointed!

Choosing Travice was one of the best decisions I made for my car. Their paint correction service worked wonders on the scratches and swirl marks that had accumulated over the years. The result was simply breathtaking. But what impressed me the most was their dedication to customer satisfaction. They patiently explained the repair process and offered honest recommendations. It's refreshing to find a company that genuinely cares about their customers. I highly recommend their services to anyone in need of exceptional car detailing and repair

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: How often should I have my car professionally detailed ?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: The frequency of professional car detailing depends on various factors such as your driving habits, weather conditions, and personal preference. As a general guideline, it is recommended to have your car detailed at least once or twice a year to maintain its appearance and protect its value.

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: Can car detailing remove scratches from my vehicle's paint ?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: While car detailing can significantly improve the appearance of your vehicle's paint, it may not completely remove deep scratches. However, professional paint correction techniques used during detailing can diminish the visibility of minor scratches and swirl marks, restoring the paint's shine and smoothness.

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: How long does it take to detail a car ?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: The time required for car detailing can vary depending on the size and condition of the vehicle, as well as the specific detailing services requested. On average, a thorough car detailing can take anywhere from a few hours to a full day. It's best to check with the detailing service provider for a more accurate estimate based on your vehicle's needs.

ekit_accordion_items.acc_title: What types of car repair services do you offer ?
ekit_accordion_items.acc_content: Our car repair services cover a wide range of mechanical and electrical issues. We provide diagnostics and repairs for engines, brakes, suspension systems, electrical systems, and more. Whether it's routine maintenance, troubleshooting a specific problem, or major repairs, our skilled technicians are equipped to handle various car repair needs.
